data.name: Garden Simulator Demo
data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Korean, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i5-series Quadcore, AMD Ryzen-series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i7-series Quadcore, AMD Ryzen-series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080, AMD Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
